Key Match Events: Palmer scored for Ecuador in the 13th minute
Paez scored a penalty for Ecuador in the 45+4th minute
Minda scored for Ecuador in the 90+1st minute
Antonio scored for Jamaica in the 54th minute
Lowe received a yellow card in the 39th minute
Hector received a yellow card in the 49th minute
Latibeaudiere received a yellow card in the 80th minute
Anderson received a yellow card in the 90+4th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador and Jamaica are seeking their first points at the 2024 Copa America
Ecuador lost 2-1 to Venezuela in their opener
Jamaica was narrowly defeated 1-0 by Mexico
Ecuador played a man short for over an hour in their previous match due to a VAR red card decision
Jamaica has not collected a single point in seven all-time Copa America affairs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ecuador will be without their team captain, Enner Valencia, due to a red card
Jeremy Sarmiento and Kendry Paez are on a yellow card and in danger of missing their final group fixture with a caution in this match
Jahmali Waite started for Jamaica in place of injured captain Andre Blake
Shamar Nicholson can surpass Walter Boyd for sixth in all-time goals for Jamaica
